purchase.title: Procurement Center
purchase.po_mgmt_desc: View and manage all purchase orders, supports online editing and version tracking.
purchase.send_mgmt_desc: View and manage all shipments, supports logistics tracking and file management.
purchase.receive_mgmt_desc: View and manage all receiving records, supports status tracking and variance management.
purchase.name: Name
purchase.hub_desc: Manage purchasing business: add suppliers, supplier management, etc.

finance.title: Finance Center
finance.hub_desc: Finance management and expense settlement: logistics fees, payment tracking.

log.subtitle: Enterprise Log Management - Error Tracking, Security Audit, Business Operations, Access Monitoring

mode.dev_note: All new logs will be marked as dev logs (dev_mode=true), can be cleaned before release.
mode.prod_note: All new logs will be permanently retained.

log.title: Log System

sales.title: Sales
sales.hub_desc: Manage sales data: transaction upload, report generation, data visualization.
sales.report_center_desc: Preview, download and manage generated analysis reports.
sales.ebay_api_desc: Automatically sync eBay orders and financial data, no manual CSV upload needed.

db_admin.hub_desc: Manage system backups, restore points and data lifecycle policies.
db_admin.title: Database Administration

products.hub_desc: Manage product archive: product data maintenance, add new products.
products.title: Product Management

inventory.hub_desc: Manage inventory data: stocktake upload, inventory modification.
inventory.title: Inventory Management

capability.title: Role Capability Configuration
capability.desc: Dynamically control Admin role permissions. Changes take effect immediately.
capability.admin_only: This panel controls regular Admin permissions only. Superuser is not affected.
capability.audit_logged: All changes are recorded in the Audit Log.
capability.restart_note: System restart restores default configuration (contact sysadmin for permanent changes).
capability.allow_create: Allow admin to create new login accounts.
capability.allow_reset_pwd: Allow admin to force reset user passwords.
capability.allow_config_perms: Allow admin to modify user module permissions.
capability.allow_promote: Allow admin to promote/demote users. Involves privilege escalation.
capability.allow_delete: Allow admin to permanently delete users.

ui.text_5: Generate a full SQL dump snapshot of the current database state.

ui.icon_3012: Scroll horizontally to view long content

ui.text_24: Inventory adjustments, cost management, and SKU maintenance.

ui.text_30: Create new product records and initialize inventory.
ui.text_32: Generate, preview, and download business intelligence reports.

desc.d041: View order details, verify products, amounts, policy
desc.d074: click paid orders to view payment records and receipts
desc.d077: click [eye] to view full abnormal record including receipt info and cargo details
desc.d078: click [tool] to enter abnormal processing wizard and select correction strategy
desc.d079: click [history] to view processing history for this shipment
desc.d082: [delete] to undo correction and restore original discrepancy
desc.d083: review 'This Deduction' (prepayment offset) and 'This Payment' (actual cash) to ensure amounts are correct.
desc.d085: (Optional) Click the upload area above to add bank slip; file will be archived to the payment ID folder after successful submission.
desc.d086: Supplier prepayment is funds you deposit in advance to a supplier account for future transaction settlements. These funds can be used to pay deposit and balance payments.
desc.d087: The supplier's settlement currency is determined by the supplier policy. To modify, go to Procurement → Supplier Management.
desc.d088: If your payment currency differs from the supplier's settlement currency, the system will convert at the current day's exchange rate to ensure account balance is calculated in a unified currency.
desc.d089: If payment currency matches settlement currency, no conversion is needed. However, the exchange rate is still recorded as a reference for future USD conversion in financial reports.
desc.d090: After payment is completed, records can be modified and all historical versions will be fully preserved.
desc.d096: Click the button below to download shipment template, which contains the latest order information
desc.d098: shown in green highlight, modifying other areas is strictly prohibited
desc.d099: The uploaded Excel is only for data entry
desc.d102: Alignment: Due to actual packaging, there may be excess or shortage remainders. Shipment quantity may not exactly match order quantity. If you need to modify order quantity, please go to Order Management first.
desc.d105: Shipment date determines available order range (filters orders on or before this date)
desc.d106: Click the button below to download shipment template Excel containing latest order information
desc.d107: If you prefer manual entry, you can skip this step and click the 'Start Creating' button below
desc.d108: In this process, only [Exchange Rate] can be modified
desc.d109: To modify other logistics information, please go to Purchase Management → Shipment Management
desc.d110: Select the date for settlement rate: Use Shipment Date or Use Payment Date.
desc.d111: Exchange rate changes will be applied uniformly to all shipments in this payment.
desc.d112: Settlement rates in the list below are for display only and cannot be modified individually. Use the 'Modify Rate' area above.
desc.d113: For additional fees (handling, service, etc.), click the 'Add Extra Fee' button.
desc.d116: Modification will create a new version; original policy is preserved
desc.d117: Adjust Category, Type, Currency as needed for your business
desc.d118: For policy info updates only, enter a new Effective Date
desc.d119: If overriding same-date policy, system will prompt for confirmation
desc.d131: Left shows original policy, right side is editable
desc.d132: To modify policy, fill in new values and required modification notes below
desc.d133: If no policy changes needed, click 'Skip Policy Modification' to proceed to details
desc.d142: Modification notes will be recorded in detail version - please fill carefully
desc.d143: Table shows all products in this order; quantity and unit price can be modified
desc.d144: Click 'Delete' to mark product for deletion (cannot be undone)
desc.d145: Click 'Add SKU' to add new products to the order
desc.d146: If no detail changes needed, click 'Skip Detail Modification' to preview
desc.d147: Modification notes are required and will be recorded in version history
desc.d148: System has automatically merged same-SKU, same-price operations to ensure data consistency
desc.d149: Please review the modifications below carefully, then click 'Confirm Modification'
desc.d150: If only policy or details were modified, the other will show 'No Changes'
desc.d151: To adjust, click 'Previous Step' to go back
desc.d152: Left shows original logistics info (ship date, ETA, pallets, freight, etc.); right side is editable
desc.d153: To modify logistics, fill in new values and required modification notes below
desc.d154: If no logistics changes needed, click 'Skip Logistics Modification' to proceed to item details
desc.d156: Modify shipment qty for each item; choose whether to regularize order (set unshipped qty to 0)
desc.d157: Click Delete to remove shipment row (qty set to 0); click Restore to undo deletion
desc.d158: Click 'Add Shipment' to add new items from existing orders
desc.d159: Negative unshipped qty shows orange highlight, indicating shipment exceeds order remaining
desc.d161: Please review the receiving details below. Click Next to complete receiving.
desc.d162: Upload receiving documents/inspection reports. Supports PDF, images, Excel, Word. Max 10MB.

action.to_view: to view full order info including policy and details
action.to_edit: to enter edit wizard, adjust policy and details
action.to_history: to view all version revision history

mgmt.po_view_desc: Click [eye] to view full order info, including policy and details
mgmt.po_edit_desc: Click [pen] to enter edit wizard and adjust policy/details
mgmt.po_history_desc: Click [history] to view all version revision history
mgmt.po_invoice_desc: Click [invoice] to view, [upload] to upload/replace invoice
mgmt.send_view_desc: Click [eye] to view full shipment info
mgmt.send_history_desc: Click [history] to view shipment revision history
mgmt.send_invoice_desc: Click [invoice] to view logistics bill, [upload] to upload/replace file
mgmt.receive_view_desc: Click [eye] to view full receipt info
mgmt.receive_history_desc: Click [history] to view receipt revision history
mgmt.receive_invoice_desc: Click [invoice] to view related files, [upload] to upload/replace
